enWisdom: The jealous one is angry at destiny

Wisdom: الْحَاسِدُ لَا يَشْفِيهِ إِلَّا زَوَالُ النِّعْمَةِ
enWisdom: Nothing cures the jealous one but cessation of the blessing
The jealous one is happy with disaster [befalling others] and saddened by [their] happiness

Wisdom: الْحَسُودُ أَبَداً عَلِيلٌ وَالْبَخِيلُ أَبَداً ذَلِيلٌ
enWisdom: The jealous one is always ill and the miser is always abased

Wisdom: الْحَاسِدُ يَرَى أَنَّ زَوَالَ النِّعْمَةِ عَمَّنْ يَحْسُدُهُ نِعْمَةٌ عَلَيْهِ
enWisdom: The jealous person considers the cessation of a blessing from the person whom he envies to be a blessing upon himself

Wisdom: الْحَاسِدُ يُظْهِرُ وُدَّهُ فِي أَقْوَالِهِ وَيُخْفِي بُغْضَهُ فِي أَفْعَالِهِ فَلَهُ اسْمُ الصَّدِيقِ وَصِفَةُ الْعَدُوِّ
enWisdom: The jealous person displays his affection in his words and hides his hatred in his actions; he has the title of a friend and the attribute of an enemy

Wisdom: لَا تَفْرَحَنَّ بِسَقْطَةِ غَيْرِكَ فَإِنَّكَ لَا تَدْرِي مَا يُحْدِثُ بِكَ الزَّمَانُ
enWisdom: Never be joyful about the downfall of others for verily you do not know what time will do to you

Wisdom: لَا تَبْتَهِجَنَّ بِخَطَاءِ غَيْرِكَ فَإِنَّكَ لَنْ تَمْلِكَ الْإِصَابَةَ أَبَداً
enWisdom: Do not be happy with the mistake of others, for indeed you will not always be correct

Wisdom: لَا يَرْضَى الْحَسُودُ عَمَّنْ يَحْسُدُهُ إِلَّا بِالْمَوْتِ أَوْ بِزَوَالِ النِّعْمَةِ
enWisdom: The jealous person is never pleased with the one whom he is jealous of except by [his] death or cessation of the blessing

Wisdom: يَشْفِيكَ مِنْ حَاسِدِكَ أَنَّهُ يَغْتَاظُ عِنْدَ سُرُورِكَ
enWisdom: It is a consolation for you that the one who is jealous of you becomes furious when you are happy
